text: "Right Place, Wrong Time" is a 1973 song by Dr. John and is the leading single to his sixth studio album In the Right Place. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 6 in Canada and number 98 in Australia. It was covered by B.B. King and Bonnie Raitt for the 1990 movie Air America. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:Dr. John songs Category:Dave Matthews Band songs Category:B.B. King songs Category:Bonnie Raitt songs
title: Right Place, Wrong Time (song)
